expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x
dart = nat : Set
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop

B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
